column4: no sound with my notebook: when I'm unplugging my AC Adapter and it beeps to sign that I've unplugged it, that's the only time my sound works. Anyone encountered something similar?
please read http://www.linux-sound.info/alsa/index.php?task=support and tell me the URL of the paste generated by the script linked from that page.

amixer: Mixer attach default error: No such device that's also what I got. I tried to install the alsa driver from source but I think that might have messed up some things. I figured that when the sound doesn't work, it doesn't matter if it gets messed up a little bit more.
